means: Earliest Arrival Time 最早到达时间

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均可表示"吃"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: eat, dine, have, consume, devour, gorge, swallow
means: eat ： 普通用词，使用广泛。既可用于人，也可用于动物。
dine ： 正式用词，既可指一日三餐中的任何一餐，也可以指特殊的用餐。
have ： 可与eat换用，但强调一次性的动作。
consume ： 侧重痛痛快快地吃得一干二净，可用于人和动物。
devour ： 指狼吞虎咽地吃，强调吃得既快又彻底。
gorge ： 侧重指拼命地吃或塞，强调吃饱或吃得过量。
swallow ： 主要指吃的整个过程的第二部分"咽"，并常指咀嚼得匆匆忙忙地吃。

sentence.Network_en: It makes sense to eat a reasonably balanced diet when slimming.
sentence.Network_cn: 在减肥过程中保持饮食的营养相对均衡是明智的。

sentence.Network_en: Jovial ladies chivvy you into ordering more than you can eat!
sentence.Network_cn: 热情的女招待会一再推荐，最后点的餐多到吃不下!

sentence.Network_en: Because you're not burning calories, everything you eat turns to fat.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于没有消耗卡路里，你吃的所有东西都会变成脂肪。

lj.lj_ly: She really eats up the constant publicity.
lj.lj_ls: 她经常被宣传而乐不可支

lj.lj_ly: She really eats up the constant publicity.
lj.lj_ls: 她经常被宣传而乐不可支

jx.jx_en_mean: suffer from excessive longing, especially for someone or something unattainable
jx.jx_cn_mean: 因渴求（尤指得不到的人或物）而痛苦，憔悴

phrase.cizu_name: eat like a bird (或 a horse)
eat someone out of house and home

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)eat a lot of someone else's food
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)把某人吃穷；吃光某人的家当

jx.jx_en_mean: retract what one has said, especially in a humiliated way
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指以屈辱方式）收回前言，承认错误

lj.lj_ly: they will eat their words when I win.
lj.lj_ls: 等我赢了，他们就会收回前言。

phrase.cizu_name: have someone eating out of one's hand

jx.jx_en_mean: have someone completely under one's control
jx.jx_cn_mean: 使某人俯首帖耳，使（某人）完全听命

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to indicate that one thinks the specified thing is extremely unlikely to happen
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)要是…就砍我的头（表示相信某事绝不会发生）

lj.lj_ly: if he comes back, I'll eat my hat.
lj.lj_ls: 如果他回来，就砍我的脑袋。

phrase.cizu_name: what's eating you (或 him 或 her)?

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)what is worrying or annoying you (or him or her)?
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)你（或他、她）在担心什么？你（或他、她）在为什么事烦恼？

phrase.cizu_name: eat something away (或 eat away at something)

lj.lj_ly: the acid began to eat away at the edge of her tunic.
lj.lj_ls: 酸开始逐渐地腐蚀她束腰外衣的边缘。

lj.lj_ly: the knowledge of his affair still ate away at her.
lj.lj_ls: 他的风流韵事对她的伤害仍然在慢慢加深。

jx.jx_en_mean: another way of saying eat away at
[usu. as adj. eaten up]dominate the thoughts of someone completely
jx.jx_cn_mean: 完全占据了某人的思想，纠缠

lj.lj_ls: 我的心中充满了犯罪感。

jx.jx_en_mean: use resources or time in very large quantities

lj.lj_ly: an operating system that eats up 200Mb of disk space.
lj.lj_ls: 一个占用200兆字节磁盘空间的操作系统。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English etan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch eten and German essen, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin edere and Greek edein

entry.def: When you eat something, you put it into your mouth, chew it, and swallow it.

example.ex: The bananas should be eaten within two days...
example.tran: 那些香蕉应该在两天内吃掉。

entry.def: If you eat sensibly or healthily, you eat food that is good for you.

example.ex: ...a campaign to persuade people to eat more healthily.
example.tran: 劝说人们饮食更加健康的宣传活动

entry.def: If you eat, you have a meal.

example.ex: We ate lunch together a few times.
example.tran: 我们一起吃过几次午餐。

entry.def: If something is eating you, it is annoying or worrying you.

example.ex: 'What the hell's eating you?' he demanded.
example.tran: “到底什么事让你心烦啊？”他问道。

entry.tran: 完全听命于;完全受…支配
entry.def: If you have someone eating out of your hand, they are completely under your control.

example.ex: She usually has the press eating out of her hand.
example.tran: 她通常都能将新闻界抓在自己手心。

entry.def: People use eat your heart out with the name of a person when they are doing something that they think the person named might be jealous of.

example.ex: A limousine was sent to pick me up and deliver me to the set. Eat your heart out, Tom Selleck!...
example.tran: 他们派了一辆豪华轿车来接我去片场，你就眼红吧，汤姆·塞立克！

example.ex: I want everyone back in Cleveland to be eating their crummy little hearts out.
example.tran: 我想让家乡克利夫兰所有那些烂人都懊悔不已。

entry.def: If you eat someone out of house and home, you eat a lot of their food, especially when you are living with them.

example.ex: Is Karen still eating you out of house and home?
example.tran: 卡伦还在只顾吃光你的家当吗？

sentences.sentence: "What did you eat for dinner last night?"

means.word_mean: 2. eat a meal; take a meal;

sentences.sentence: "We did not eat until 10 P.M. because there were so many phone calls"
"I didn't eat yet, so I gladly accept your invitation"

means.word_mean: 3. take in food; used of animals only;

sentences.sentence: "This dog doesn't eat certain kinds of meat"
"this car consumes a lot of gas"
"They run through 20 bottles of wine a week"

means.word_mean: 5. worry or cause anxiety in a persistent way;
6. cause to deteriorate due to the action of water, air, or an acid;

sentences.sentence: "The steady dripping of water rusted the metal stopper in the sink"

slang.tokens: Do you eat with that mouth? (=You eat with that mouth?)

list.explanation: (指说下流话、脏话)你说得出口？

example.en: That's a lot of foul talk. Do you eat with that mouth?
example.zh: 那么一大堆下流话。你竟说得出口？

example.en: You talk dirt a lot. You eat with that mouth?
example.zh: 你脏话连篇。你说得出口?

example.en: The rent ate up half my pay.
example.zh: 房租花掉了我一半工资。

example.en: Extravagant spending ate up his saving.
example.zh: 他挥霍无度把积蓄都用完了。

list.explanation: 赞赏，倾心喜欢，极感兴趣

example.en: He really ate that show up.
London society simply ate him up.
example.zh: 伦敦上流社会对他极其赞赏。

auth_sentence.content: Shanghai people eat a lot of duck and chicken.

auth_sentence.content: Yet, the animals eat them just the same.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet, the animals eat them just the same.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet, the animals eat them just the same.

Sentence.sentence: So how can eating meat have a negative effect on the environment?
By eating food grown in Sudan and Zaire
It can forge better relationships and help you cope with life, or it can be corrosive eating away your self-esteem and irritating others.

sentences.en: He was too ill to eat.
We eat to live, not live to eat.
sentences.cn: 我们吃饭是为了活着, 而不是活着为了吃饭。

sentences.en: He ate a piece of pear.
She had never eaten Chinese food before.
What do you usually eat for lunch?
I made a fierce countenance as if I would eat him alive.
sentences.cn: 我脸色恶狠狠地, 仿佛要把他活生生地吞下去。

sentences.en: John and Mary ate their dinner cold.
sentences.cn: 约翰和玛丽吃了凉的饭菜。

sentences.en: They usually ate the herb raw.
sentences.cn: 他们经常吃未煮过的药草。

sentences.en: The train ate the miles eastwards.

jushi.english: He was too ill to eat.
